title: Frida Baby DermaFrida The SkinSoother Baby Bath Silicone Brush| Baby Essential for Dry Skin, Cradle Cap and Eczema (2 Pack)
description: Kick dry skin + flakes to the curb and prevent resting itch face. SkinSoother is a baby spa in the palm of your hand, keeping baby's biggest organ- the skin, healthy, flake-free and soft. For general use and dry skin- apply cleanser at bath time and brush in a circular motion from head to toe. For eczema- use the brush in a circular motion to gently massage lotion into skin.
